channel.title: Noting items in bank
channel.description:
When I put a noted item into a bank, it un-notes it. Fair enough that's kinda useful. But when I click "note" and try to take it out noted again, it won't note.
This happens with ALL items. Potions, food, armour, the lot.
Any ideas on how to fix this?

item.title: Noting items in bank
item.dc:creator: @Devastational Devastational
item.description:

When I put a noted item into a bank, it un-notes it. Fair enough that’s kinda useful. But when I click “note” and try to take it out noted again, it won’t note.
